body_html:
I spoke to a few people, and it looks like this is what we tried to mean there:

If you already have a version of protobuf installed, you should run the uninstall command. After that when you run pip install tensorflow, this command will install the correct version of protobuf, as it will install all TensorFlow dependencies.

We will update the website to reflect the above.
body_text:
I spoke to a few people, and it looks like this is what we tried to mean there:
If you already have a version of protobuf installed, you should run the uninstall command. After that when you run pip install tensorflow, this command will install the correct version of protobuf, as it will install all TensorFlow dependencies.
We will update the website to reflect the above.
body:
I spoke to a few people, and it looks like this is what we tried to mean there:

If you already have a version of protobuf installed, you should run the uninstall command. After that when you run `pip install tensorflow`, this command will install the correct version of protobuf, as it will install all TensorFlow dependencies.

We will update the website to reflect the above.
